nodes.text: Korrick Wain was a businessman and the owner of Wain Prospecting living during the Galactic War. Unsatisfied with a number of laws to obey as a legitimate businessman, he eventually moved his business to the lawless planet Rishi, rich with exonium. Aware that he would be forced to deal with thieves and criminals instead of tax collectors and lawyers, he was still unprepared for the amount of trouble delivered to him by Rodian Gorro and his Whiphid honor-brother Grumm.
